<file path="source.swift">
import Foundation

protocol Describable:

class Point:
    var x: Int
    var y: Int
    var magnitude: Double
    var description: String
    -func isValid() -> Bool
    ~func transform(by: Point)

class Rectangle:
    var origin: Point
    var size: (width: Int, height: Int)
    -var areaCache: Int?
    var area: Int
    var description: String
    -func contains(point: Point) -> Bool
    ~func updateOrigin(to: Point)

class UIRectangle:
    -var isVisible: Bool
    var description: String
    func show()
    func hide()
    -func validateForDisplay() -> Bool
~func descriptorDemo()
</file>
